duas.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ رَبَّ السَّمٰوَاتِ السَّبْعِ وَمَا أَظْلَلْنَ ، وَرَبَّ الْأَرْضِيْنَ السَّبْعِ وَمَا أَقْلَلْنَ ، ورَبَّ الشَّيَاطِيْنِ وَمَا أَضْلَلْنَ ، ورَبَّ الرِّيَاحِ وَمَا ذَرَيْنَ ، أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَ هٰذِهِ الْقَرْيَةِ وَخَيْرَ أَهْلِهَا وَخَيْرَ مَا فِيْهَا ، وأَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّهَا وَشَرِّ أَهْلِهَا وَشَرِّ مَا فِيْهَا
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma Rabba-s-samāwāti-s-sabʿi wa mā aẓlaln, wa Rabba-l-arḍīna-s-sabʿi wa mā aqlaln, wa Rabba-sh-shayāṭīni wa-mā aḍlaln, wa Rabba-r-riyāḥi wa mā dharayn, as’aluka khayra hādhihi-l-qaryati wa khayra ahlihā wa khayra mā fīhā, wa aʿūdhu bika min sharrihā wa sharri ahlihā wa sharri mā fīhā.
duas.translation: Ae Allah, jo saat aasman hain aur jo kuchh unke neeche hain, aur jo saat zameen hain aur jo kuchh unke upar hai, aur shayateen aur jo kuchh unko gumraah karta hai, aur hawain aur jo kuchh unko udhati hain, sab ke Rubb! Main tujhse is sheher ki bhalayi, iske logon ki bhalayi, aur isme jo bhalayi hai uski dua karta hoon, aur is sheher ke sharr se, iske logon ke sharr se, aur isme jo sharr hai usse teri panah maangta hoon.
duas.hadith: Ṣuhayb (raḍiy Allāhu ʿanhu) ne riwayat kiya ke Allah ke Rasool ﷺ ne kabhi kisi jagah ke qareeb nahi jaate, jab tak ke yeh [upar wali] dua nahi padte. (Nasā’ī in al-Sunan al-Kubrā 10302, Ibn al-Sunnī 524)

duas.title: Raat ke waqt safar mein rukte waqt
duas.arabic: يَا أَرْضُ ، رَبِّي وَرَبُّكِ اللَّهُ ، أَعُوذُ بِاللَّهِ مِنْ شَرِّكِ وَشَرِّ مَا فِيكِ ، وَشَرِّ مَا خُلِقَ فِيكِ ، وَمِنْ شَرِّ مَا يَدِبُّ عَلَيْكِ ، وَأَعُوذُ بِاللَّهِ مِنْ أَسَدٍ وَأَسْوَدَ ، وَمِنَ الْحَيَّةِ وَالْعَقْرَبِ ، وَمِنْ سَاكِنِ الْبَلَدِ ، وَمِنْ وَالِدٍ وَمَا وَلَدَ
duas.transliteration: Yā arḍu, Rabbī wa Rabbuki-llah, aʿūdhu bi-llāhi min sharrik, wa sharri mā fīk, wa sharri mā khuliqa fīk, wa min sharri mā yaddibbu ʿalayk, wa aʿūdhu bi-llāhi min asadin wa aswad, wa mina-l-hayyati wa-l-ʿaqrab, wa min sākini-l-balad, wa min wālidiw wa mā walad.
duas.translation: Ae zameen, tera bhi Rubb aur mera bhi Rubb Allah hai. Main Allah ki panah mangta hoon tere sharr se, tere andar jo kuchh bhi hai uske sharr se, aur us cheez ke sharr se jo tere andar paida ki gayi hai, aur us cheez ke sharr se jo tere upar chalti hai. Main Allah ki panah mangta hoon sher se, siah jandar se, saanp aur bichhu se, aur iss zameen ke rehne walon se, aur ma se aur uske paida shuda se.
duas.hadith: ʿUmar b. Khaṭṭāb (raḍiy Allāhu ‘anhu) ne riwayat kiya: 'Jab Allah ke Rasool ﷺ raat ke waqt safar mein rukte, to yeh [upar wali] dua padte.' (Abū Dāwūd 2603)

duas.title: Jab koi sawari sambhal nahi rahi ho
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ ثَبِّتْهُ وَاجْعَلْهُ هَادِيًا مَهْدِيًّا
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma thab-bithu wa-jaʿalhu hādiyam mahdiyyā.
duas.translation: Ae Allah, ise mazboot farma de aur ise hidaayat dene wala aur hidaayat yafta bana de.
duas.hadith: Jarīr b. ʿAbdullāh al-Bajalī (raḍiy Allāhu ‘anhu) ne riwayat kiya: 'Jab se main ne Islam qubool kiya, Allah ke Rasool ﷺ ne mujhe apne samne dekha aur muskuraye, aur kabhi nahi roka.' Maine Nabi ﷺ se apni sawari ki shikayat ki ke mujhe uspar sambhal nahi aati. Unhone mere seenay par apna haath rakha aur yeh [upar wali] dua farmayi. (Bukhārī 3036)

duas.title: Subah hone par
duas.arabic: سَمَّعَ سَامِعٌ بِحَمْدِ اللَّهِ وَحُسْنِ بَلاَئِهِ عَلَيْنَا ، رَبَّنَا صَاحِبْنَا وَأَفْضِلْ عَلَيْنَا عَائِذًا بِاللَّهِ مِنَ النَّارِ
duas.transliteration: Samma‘a sāmi‘un bi-hamdi-llāhi wa husni balā’ihi ‘alaynā, Rabbanā sāhibnā wa afdil ‘alaynā ‘ā’idhan bi-llāhi mina-n-nār.
duas.translation: Ek sunne wale ne Allah ki hamd aur hum par uske acchhe imtihaan ko suna. Hamare Rubb! Hamaare saath raho, humein apni fazal baksho aur humein dozakh se panah do.
duas.hadith: Abū Hurayra (raḍiy Allāhu ‘anhu) ne riwayat kiya ke jab Allah ke Rasool ﷺ safar par nikalte, to subah hone par yeh [upar wali] dua farmate. (Muslim 2718)

duas.title: Karz ke bojh se nijat ke liye #1
duas.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ اكْفِنِيْ بِحَلَالِكَ عَنْ حَرَامِكَ ، وَأَغْنِنِيْ بِفَضْلِكَ عَمَّنْ سِوَاكَ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma-k-finī bi-ḥalālika ʿan ḥarāmik, wa aghninī bi-faḍlika ʿamman siwāk.
duas.translation: Ae Allah, apne halaal ke zariye mujhe apne haraam se bacha le, aur apne fazl se mujhe apne siwa sab se beparwa kar de.
duas.hadith: ʿAlī (raḍiy Allāhu ʿanhu) ne farmaya ke ek ghulam jo apni azadi khareed raha tha, unke paas aaya aur kaha, 'Main apni azadi ke liye paisa ada karne ke qabil nahi hoon, to meri madad karein.' Unhone farmaya, 'Kya main tumhein wo kalimaat na sikhaoon jo Allah ke Rasool ﷺ ne mujhe sikhaye? Agar tumhara qarz Sareer (ek pahad ka naam) ke barabar bhi hota, Allah use bhi ada kar dega. Yeh dua padho: [upar wali dua].' (Tirmidhī 3563)

duas.title: Karz ke bojh se nijat ke liye #2
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّ السَّمَوَاتِ وَرَبَّ الأَرْضِ وَرَبَّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ ، رَبَّنَا وَرَبَّ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ ، فَالِقَ الْحَبِّ وَالنَّوَى وَمُنْزِلَ التَّوْرَاةِ وَالإِنْجِيلِ وَالْفُرْقَانِ ، أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ أَنْتَ آخِذٌ بِنَاصِيَتِهِ ، اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ الأَوَّلُ فَلَيْسَ قَبْلَكَ شَىْءٌ ، وَأَنْتَ الآخِرُ فَلَيْسَ بَعْدَكَ شَىْءٌ، وَأَنْتَ الظَّاهِرُ فَلَيْسَ فَوْقَكَ شَىْءٌ ، وَأَنْتَ الْبَاطِنُ فَلَيْسَ دُونَكَ شَىْءٌ ، اقْضِ عَنَّا الدَّيْنَ وَأَغْنِنَا مِنَ الْفَقْرِ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma Rabb-as-samāwāti wa Rabba-l-arḍi wa Rabba-l-ʿArshi-l-ʿaẓīm, Rabbanā wa Rabba kulli shay’, fāliqa-l-ḥabbi wa-n-nawā, wa munzila-t-tawrāti wa-l-injīli wa-l-furqān, aʿūdhu bika min sharri kulli shay’in Anta ākhidhun bi-nāṣiyatih, Allāhumma Anta-l-Awwalu fa-laysa qablaka shay’, wa Anta-l-Ākhiru fa-laysa baʿdaka shay’, wa Anta-ẓ-Ẓāhiru fa-laysa fawqaka shay’, wa Anta-l-Bāṭinu fa-laysa dūnaka shay’, iqḍi ʿanna-d-dayna wa aghninā mina-l-faqr.
duas.translation: Ae Allah, aasmanon ke Rabb, zameen ke Rabb, aur azeem arsh ke Rabb! Hamare Rabb aur har cheez ke Rabb! Beej aur dana faad kar nikalne wale, Taurat, Injeel, aur Furqan nazil karne wale! Main teri panaah chahta hoon har cheez ke sharr se jise tu apne qabze mein rakhta hai. Ae Allah, tu Pehla hai, tujhse pehle kuch nahi, tu Akhri hai, tujhke baad kuch nahi. Tu zahir hai, tujhse upar kuch nahi, tu baatin hai, tere siwa kuch nahi. Hamara qarz ada kar de aur humein faqriat se nijat de.
duas.hadith: Suhayl ne riwayat kiya ke Abū Sāliḥ humein farmate: 'Jab tum mein se koi soone ka irada kare, to apni daayi taraf lete aur yeh [upar wali] dua padhe.' Abū Saliḥ ne yeh Abū Hurayrah (raḍiy Allāhu ‘anhu) se riwayat kiya jo Allah ke Rasool ﷺ se riwayat karte the. (Muslim 2713)

duas.title: Karz ke bojh se nijat ke liye #3
duas.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ إِنِّيْ أَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحَزَنِ ، وَأَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ، وَأَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْجُبْنِ وَالْبُخْلِ ، وَأَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ غَلَبَةِ الدَّيْنِ وَقَهْرِ الرِّجَالِ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma innī aʿūdhu bika min-l-hammi wa-l-ḥazan, wa aʿūdhu bika min-l-ʿajzi wa-l-kasal, wa aʿūdhu bika min-l-jubni wa-l-bukhl, wa aʿūdhu bika min ghalabati-d-dayni wa qahri-r-rijāl.
duas.translation: Ae Allah, main tujhse pareshani aur gham se panaah maangta hoon. Main tujhse ajazi aur susti se panaah maangta hoon. Main tujhse buzdili aur bakhil se panaah maangta hoon, aur main tujhse qarz ke bojh aur mardon ke zulm se panaah maangta hoon.
duas.hadith: Abū Saʿīd al-Khudrī (raḍiy Allāhu ʿanhu) ne riwayat kiya ke ek din, Allah ke Rasool ﷺ masjid mein dakhil huye. Unhone ek Ansari shakhs ko dekha jiska naam Abū Umāmah (raḍiy Allāhu ʿanhu) tha. Nabi ﷺ ne poocha, 'Kya baat hai? Tum masjid mein is waqt kyun baithe ho jab namaz ka waqt nahi hai?' Usne jawab diya, 'Kabhi khatam na hone wali pareshaniyon aur qarzon ki wajah se, Allah ke Rasool ﷺ.' Allah ke Rasool ﷺ ne poocha, 'Kya main tumhein wo kalimat na sikhaoon jinke zariye, jab tum yeh kahoge, Allah tumhari pareshaniyan door kar dega, aur tumhare qarz ada kar dega?' Usne jawab diya, 'Jee haan, zaroor, Allah ke Rasool ﷺ.' Unhone farmaya, 'Subah aur shaam yeh [upar wali] dua padho.' Abū Umāmah (raḍiy Allāhu ʿanhu) ne farmaya, 'Phir main ne aisa kiya, aur Allah ne meri pareshaniyan door kar di aur mere qarz ada kar diye.' (Abū Dāwūd 1555)

duas.title: Karz ke bojh se nijat ke liye #4
duas.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ مَالِكَ الْمُلْكِ ، تُؤْتِي الْمُلْكَ مَنْ تَشَاءُ ، وَتَنْزِعُ الْمُلْكَ مِمَّنْ تَشَاءُ ، وَتُعِزُّ مَنْ تَشَاءُ ، وَتُذِلُّ مَنْ تَشَاءُ ، بِيَدِكَ الْخَيْرُ ، إِنَّكَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيْرٌ ، رَحْمٰنَ الدُّنْيَا وَالْآخِرَةِ وَرَحِيْمَهُمَا ، تُعْطِيْهِمَا مَنْ تَشَاءُ ، وَتَمْنَعُ مِنْهُمَا مَنْ تَشَاءُ ، اِرْحَمْنِيْ رَحْمَةً تُغْنِيْنِيْ بِهَا عَنْ رَّحْمَةِ مَنْ سِوَاكَ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma Mālikal-mulk, tuʿṭi-l-mulka man tashā’, wa tanziʿu-l-mulka mim-man tashā’, wa tuʿizzu man tashā’, wa tudhillu man tashā’, bi-yadika-l-khayr, innaka ʿalā kulli shay’in Qadīr. Raḥmāna-d-dunyā wa-l-ākhirati wa Raḥīmahumā, tuʿṭīhimā man tashā’, wa tamnaʿu minhumā man tashā’, irḥamnī raḥmatan tughnīnī bihā ʿan raḥmati man siwāk.
duas.translation: Ae Allah! Mulk ka Malik, tu jisey chahe mulk deta hai, aur jisey chahe mulk chheen leta hai. Tu jisey chahe izzat deta hai, aur jisey chahe zillat deta hai. Har bhalayi tere hi haath mein hai, aur tu har cheez par Qadir hai. Duniya aur akhirat ke Rahman aur Rahim, tu jisey chahe deta hai, aur jisey chahe rokte hai. Mujh par apni aisi rehmat farmade jo mujhe teri siwa kisi aur ki rehmat se beparwa kar de.
duas.hadith: Anas b. Mālik (raḍiy Allāhu ʿanhu) ne riwayat kiya ke Allah ke Rasool ﷺ ne Muʿādh se farmaya, 'Kya main tumhein aisi dua na sikhaoon jo agar tum isse maango to Allah tumhara qarz chuka de, agar yeh pahaad ke barabar bhi ho? Ae Muʿādh! Kehna: [upar wali dua].' (Ṭabarānī in al-Muʿjam al-Ṣaghīr 558)

duas.title: Karz ada karte waqt dua
duas.arabic: بَارَك اللَّهُ لَكَ فِي أهْلِكَ ومَالِكَ
duas.transliteration: Bāraka-llāhu laka fi ahlika wa mālik.
duas.translation: Allah tumhare ahl aur maal mein barakat ata kare.
duas.hadith: ʿAbdullāh b. Abī Rabīʿah (raḍiy Allāhu ‘anhu) se riwayat hai ke Nabi ﷺ ne unse chalis hazar dirham udhar liye. Jab kuch maal unke paas aaya, to Nabi ﷺ ne unka qarz chuka diya aur yeh dua farmayi: [upar wali dua]. (Ibn Mājah 2424)

duas.title: Doulat mein barkat ke liye #1
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ عِلْمًا نَافِعًا ، وَرِزْقًا طَيِّبًا ، وَعَمَلًا مُتَقَبَّلًا
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma innī as’aluka ʿilman-nāfiʿā, wa rizqan ṭayyibā, wa ʿamalam-mutaqabbalā.
duas.translation: Ae Allah! Main tujhse faidamand ilm, paak rizq, aur maqbool amal ka talib hoon.
duas.hadith: Umm Salamah (raḍiy Allāhu ‘anhā) se riwayat hai ke Nabi ﷺ jab Fajr ki namaz ada karte, to salam ke baad yeh [upar wali] dua padhte. (Ibn Mājah 925)

duas.title: Doulat mein barkat ke liye #2
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي ، وَاهْدِنِي ، وَارْزُقْنِي ، وَعَافِنِي ، أَعُوذُ بِاللَّهِ مِنْ ضِيْقِ الْمَقَامِ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma ghfir lī wa-hdinī wa-rzuqnī wa āfinī, aʿūdhu bi-llāhi min ḍīqi-l-maqāmi yawma-l-qiyāmah.
duas.translation: Ae Allah! Mujhe bakhsh de, mujhe hidayat de, mujhe rizq de, aur mujhe afiyat de. Main qayamat ke din ki pareshaniyon se teri panaah maangta hoon.
duas.hadith: ʿĀsim b. Ḥumayd se riwayat hai ke unhone ʿĀ’ishah (raḍiy Allāhu ‘anhā) se poocha ke Nabi ﷺ apne tahajjud ki namaz kis dua se shuru karte the. Unhone jawab diya ke tumne aisa sawal poocha hai jo kisi ne mujhse pehle nahi poocha. Nabi ﷺ apni namaz yeh [upar wali] dua se shuru karte the. (Nasā’ī 1617)

duas.title: Doulat mein barkat ke liye #3
duas.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ إنِّي أَسْأَلُك مِنْ فَضْلِكَ وَرَحْمَتِكَ ، فَإِنَّهُ لاَ يَمْلِكُهَا إِلاَّ أَنْتَ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma innī as’aluka min fadlika wa rahmatik, fa-innahū lā yamlikuhā illā Ant.
duas.translation: Ae Allah! Main tujhse tere fazl aur teri rehmat ka talabgaar hoon, kyunki is par sirf tera ikhtiyar hai.
duas.hadith: ʿAbdullāh b. Masʿud (raḍiy Allāhu ʿanhu) se riwayat hai ke Nabi ﷺ ne ek mehman ki mehmani ki aur apni biwiyon se khaana manga magar kisi ke paas kuch nahi tha. Unhone phir yeh [upar wali] dua ki. Uske baad unke paas ek bhuna hua bakra aaya. Unhone farmaya, 'Yeh Allah ka fazl hai, aur hum uski rehmat ke intezaar kar rahe hain.' (Tabarāni in Mu’jam al-Kabir 10379)

duas.title: Chheenkne par kehna
duas.arabic: اَلْحَمْدُ للهِ
duas.transliteration: Al-ḥamdu li-llāh.
duas.translation: Allah ki hamd hai.
duas.hadith:
Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya, 'Jab tumme se koi chheenkay, to usey kehna chahiye [upar wali dua].' (Bukhārī 6224)

Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya, 'Allah ko chheenkna pasand hai aur jamhayi pasand nahi hai. Agar koi chheenkta hai aur phir Allah ki hamd karte hue dua karta hai, to har uss Musalman par jo usko sunay, jawab dena zaroori hai. Lekin jamhayi Shaytan ki taraf se hoti hai, to har insaan ko isse rokna chahiye. Agar koi jamhayi lete hue 'Hā' kahe, to Shaytan uspe hans padta hai.' (Bukhārī 6223)

Do aadmi Nabi ﷺ ke samne chheenkay. Nabi ﷺ ne ek ko jawab diya lekin doosray ko nahi diya. Jab pucha gaya to Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya, 'Usne Allah ki hamd ki thi (jab usne chheenkha), jab ke doosray ne Allah ki hamd nahi ki.' (Bukhārī 6221)

Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya, 'Musalman ka Musalman par haq chhe hai.' Unse pucha gaya, 'Ae Allah ke Rasool ﷺ, wo kya hain?' Unhone jawab diya, 'Jab tum usse milo to salam karo; jab wo tumhe dawat de to qabool karo; jab wo tumse mashwara maange to mashwara do; jab wo chheenkay aur Allah ki hamd kare to jawab do; jab wo beemaar ho to uski aiyadat karo; aur jab wo wafat paaye to uske janaze mein shamil ho.' (Muslim 2162)

duas.title: Aapka saathi jawab de
duas.arabic: يَرْحَمُكَ اللهُ
duas.transliteration: Yarḥamuka-llāh.
duas.translation: Allah tumpar apni rehmat farmaye.
duas.hadith: Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya, 'Jab tumme se koi chheenkay, to usse kehna chahiye 'Alḥamdulillāh'. Uska bhai ya saathi usko kehna chahiye 'Yarḥamuk Allah'. Aur jab wo kehta hai 'Yarḥamuk Allah', to usse jawab dena chahiye 'Yahdīkumu Allah wa yuṣliḥu bālakum.' (Bukhārī 6224)

duas.title: Phir aapko kehna chahiye
duas.arabic: يَهْدِيْكُمُ اللهُ وَيُصْلِحُ بَالَكُمْ‏
duas.transliteration: Yahdīkumu-llāhu wa yuṣliḥu bālakum.
duas.translation: Allah tumhe hidayat de aur tumhare maamlat sudhaare.
duas.hadith:
Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya, 'Jab tumme se koi chheenkay, to usse kehna chahiye 'Alḥamdulillāh'. Uska bhai ya saathi usko kehna chahiye 'Yarḥamuk Allah'. Aur jab wo kehta hai 'Yarḥamuk Allah', to usse jawab dena chahiye 'Yahdīkumu Allah wa yuṣliḥu bālakum.' (Bukhārī 6224)

Yahudi log Nabi ﷺ ke samne chheenkte the taake Nabi ﷺ unhe 'Yarḥamukum Allah' kehkar dua dein, lekin wo kehte 'Yahdīkumu Allah wa yuṣliḥu bālakum.' (Abū Dāwūd 5038)

duas.title: Musalman se milne par kehna
duas.arabic: السَّلَامُ عَلَيْكُمْ وَرَحْمَةُ اللَّهِ وَبَرَكَاتُهُ
duas.transliteration: Assālamu ʿalaykum wa raḥmatu-llāhi wa barakātuh.
duas.translation: Tumpar salamti ho, Allah ki rehmat aur barkat ho.
duas.hadith:
ʿImrān b. Ḥusayn (raḍiy Allāhu ʿanhu) ne riwayat ki ke ek shakhs Nabi ﷺ ke paas aaya aur kaha, 'Assālamu ʿalaykum'. Nabi ﷺ ne jawab diya aur fir baith gaye. Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya, 'Dus (nekiyan mili).' Phir doosra shakhs aaya aur kaha, 'Assālamu ʿalaykum wa raḥmatu-llāh.' Nabi ﷺ ne uska jawab diya aur wo baith gaya. Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya, 'Bees (nekiyan mili).' Phir teesra shakhs aaya aur kaha, 'Assālamu ʿalaykum wa raḥmatu-llāhi wa barakātuh.' Nabi ﷺ ne uska jawab diya aur wo baith gaya. Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya, 'Tees (nekiyan mili).' (Abū Dāwūd 5195)

ʿAbdullāh b. ʿAmr b. ʿĀṣ (raḍiy Allāhu ʿanhumā) ne riwayat ki ke ek shakhs ne Nabi ﷺ se pucha, 'Islam ka sabse behtareen amal kya hai?' Unhone farmaya, 'Logo ko khilana aur jo tumhe jante hain aur jo nahi jante unhe salam kehna.' (Bukhārī 12)

Abū Hurayrah (raḍiy Allāhu ʿanhu) ne riwayat ki ke Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya, 'Allah ne Adam ko apni surat par paida kiya, aur unki lambai saath hath thi. Jab Allah ne Adam ko paida kiya, to unse kaha, 'Jao aur un farishton ke giroh se milo, aur suno wo tumhe kis salam se jawab dete hain; kyunki yahi tumhara salam hoga aur tumhari aulad ka salam hoga.' Adam ne kaha, 'Assālamu ʿalaykum.' Unhone jawab diya, 'Wa ʿalaykum as-salām wa raḥmatu-llāh.' Unhone 'Allah ki rehmat' ko shamil kiya.' (Bukhārī 3326)

duas.title: Kisi shakhs ka shukriya ada karte waqt
duas.arabic: جَزَاكَ اللَّهُ خَيْرًا
duas.transliteration: Jazāk-Allāhu khayrā.
duas.translation: Allah tumhe behtareen jaza de.
duas.hadith: Usāmah b. Zayd (raḍiy Allāhu ʿanhu) ne riwayat ki ke Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya, 'Jisne bhi kisi ka shukriya ada kiya aur phir ye dua ki, usne apne shukr ada karne ka haqq ada kar diya.' (Tirmidhī 2035)

duas.title: Jab koi aapko bataye ke wo aapko mohabbat karta hai
duas.arabic: أَحَبَّكَ الَّذِيْ أَحْبَبْتَنِيْ لَهُ
duas.transliteration: Aḥabbaka-lladhī aḥbabtanī lahu.
duas.translation: Jis Allah ki khatir tum mujhse mohabbat karte ho, wo bhi tumse mohabbat kare.
duas.hadith:
Anas (raḍiy Allāhu ‘anhu) ne riwayat kiya, 'Ek shakhs Nabi ﷺ ke saath tha jab doosra shakhs guzra. Usne kaha, 'Ae Allah ke Rasool ﷺ, main is shakhs se mohabbat karta hoon.' Nabi ﷺ ne usse poocha, 'Kya tumne usko yeh bataya?' 'Nahi,' usne jawab diya. Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya, 'Usey batado.' Jab wo us shakhs se mila to kaha, 'Main Allah ke liye tumse mohabbat karta hoon.' Usne jawab diya, 'Aḥabbaka-lladhī aḥbabtanī lahu.' (Abū Dāwūd 5125)

Miqdām b. Maʿdikarib (raḍiy Allāhu ‘anhu) ne riwayat ki ke Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya, 'Agar tumme se koi shakhs apne bhai se mohabbat karta hai to usey bataye ke wo usse mohabbat karta hai.' (Tirmidhī 2392)

duas.title: Dulha dulhan ke liye dua #1
duas.arabic: بَارَكَ اللهُ لَكَ ، وَبَارَكَ عَلَيْكَ ، وَجَمَعَ بَيْنَكُمَا فِيْ خَيْرٍ
duas.transliteration: Bāraka-llāhu lak, wa bāraka ʿalayk, wa jamaʿa baynakumā fī khayr.
duas.translation: Allah tumhe barkat de, tum par apni barkat barsaye, aur tum dono ko bhale ka sathi banaye.
duas.hadith: Abū Hurayrah (raḍiy Allāhu ʿanhu) ne riwayat kiya ki Nabi ﷺ jab kisi shakhs ko shadi ki mubarakbad dete, to yeh dua farmate [upar wali dua]. (Abū Dāwūd 2130)

duas.title: Dulha dulhan ke liye dua #2
duas.arabic: بَارَكَ اللَّهُ لَكَ
duas.transliteration: Bāraka-llahu lak.
duas.translation: Allah tumhe barkat de.
duas.hadith: Anas bin Mālik (raḍiy Allāhu ‘anhu) ne riwayat kiya ke Nabi ﷺ ne ʿAbdur Rahmān bin ʿAwf par zard ittar ka asar dekha aur unse pucha, 'Ye kya hai?' Unhone jawab diya, 'Ae Allah ke Rasool ﷺ, maine ek aurat se shadi ki hai aur usko ek pathar ke barabar sona mehr diya.' Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya [upar wali dua] aur phir farmaya, 'Daawat karo, chahe ek bakri se hi ho.' (Ibn Mājah 1907)

duas.title: Dulha dulhan ke liye dua #3
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ فِيْهِمَا ، وَبَارِكْ لَهُمَا فِيْ بِنَائِهِمَا
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma bārik fīhima, wa bārik lahuma fī binā’ihimā.
duas.translation: Ae Allah, in dono mein barkat ata farma, aur unke rishte mein barkat de.
duas.hadith: Buraydah (raḍiy Allāhu ‘anhu) ne riwayat kiya ke Nabi ﷺ ne yeh dua Ali (raḍiy Allāhu ‘anhu) aur Fatimah (raḍiy Allāhu ‘anhā) ki shadi ke raat ko farmayi thi. (Al Mu’jam Al Kabīr Tabrāni 1153)

duas.title: Shadi ke waqt ki dua
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَهَا وَخَيْرَ مَا جَبَلْتَهَا عَلَيْهِ ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّهَا وَمِنْ شَرِّ مَا جَبَلْتَهَا عَلَيْهِ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma innī as’aluka khayrahā, wa khayra ma jabaltahā ʿalayhi, wa aʿūdhu bika min sharriha, wa min sharri ma jabaltahā ʿalayh.
duas.translation: Ae Allah, main tujhse is aurat ki bhalayi ka talib hoon aur jo bhalayi tu ne isme paida ki hai. Aur main iske shar aur jo shar tu ne isme paida kiya hai usse teri panaah maangta hoon.
duas.hadith: ʿAmr b. Shuʿayb (raḍiy Allāhu ‘anhu) ne apne walid se aur unke dada (ʿAbdullah b. ʿAmr ibn al-ʿAs) se riwayat ki ke Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya: 'Jab tumme se koi shakhs aurat se shadi kare ya ghulami kare, to use yeh dua kehna chahiye [upar wali dua]. Agar wo kisi oont ko khareedta hai to uske koonch ki balayi maange aur yeh dua kare.' (Abū Dāwūd 2160)

duas.title: Jinsi taalluq se pehle ki dua
duas.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ ، اللَّهُمَّ جَنِّبْنَا الشَّيْطَانَ ، وَجَنِّبِ الشَّيْطَانَ مَا رَزَقْتَنَا‏
duas.transliteration: Bismi-llāh, Allāhumma jannibna-sh-shayṭān, wa jannibi-sh-shayṭāna mā razaqtanā.
duas.translation: Allah ke naam se (shuru karte hain). Ae Allah, humein Shayṭān se bacha, aur jo aulad tu humein de usse bhi Shayṭān se bacha.
duas.hadith: Ibn ʿAbbās (radiy Allāhū ʿanhumā) ne riwayat kiya ke Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya, 'Agar tumme se koi apni biwi ke paas jaye aur yeh dua padhe, aur unko aulad naseeb ho, to Shayṭān usko nuksan nahi pahuncha sakega.' (Bukhārī 141)

duas.title: Aulad ke liye dua
duas.arabic: رَبِّ لَا تَذَرْنِي فَرْدًا وَأَنْتَ خَيْرُ الْوَارِثِينَ
duas.transliteration: Rabbi lā tadharnī farda-w-wa Anta khayrul-wārithīn.
duas.translation: Ae mere Rabb, mujhe akela mat chhod aur tu behtareen waris hai. (21:89)

duas.title: Neik aulad ke liye dua #1
duas.arabic: رَبَّنَا هَبْ لَنَا مِنْ أَزْوَاجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّاتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعْيُنٍ وَاجْعَلْنَا لِلْمُتَّقِينَ إِمَامًا
duas.transliteration: Rabbanā hab lanā min azwājinā wa dhuriyyātinā qurrata aʿyuni-w-wajʿalnā lil-muttaqīna imāmā.
duas.translation: Ae hamare Rabb, hamein apni biwiyon aur aulad se ankhon ki thandak ata farma, aur humein muttaqiyon ka imām bana. (25:74)

duas.title: Neik aulad ke liye dua #2
duas.arabic: رَبِّ اجْعَلْنِي مُقِيمَ الصَّلَاةِ وَمِنْ ذُرِّيَّتِي ۚ رَبَّنَا وَتَقَبَّلْ دُعَاءِ
duas.transliteration: Rabbij-ʿalnī muqīma-ṣ-ṣalāti wa min dhurriy-yatī Rabbanā wa taqabbal duʿā’.
duas.translation: Ae mere Rabb, mujhe aur meri aulad ko namaz ke qaim rakhnay walon mein se bana de. Ae hamare Rabb, meri dua qubool farma. (14:40)

duas.title: Neik aulad ke liye dua #3
duas.arabic: رَبِّ هَبْ لِي مِنَ الصَّالِحِينَ
duas.transliteration: Rabbi hab lī mina-ṣ-ṣāliḥīn.
duas.translation: Ae mere Rabb, mujhe neik aulad ata farma. (37:100)

duas.title: Neik aulad ke liye dua #4
duas.arabic: رَبِّ هَبْ لِي مِنْ لَدُنْكَ ذُرِّيَّةً طَيِّبَةً ۖ إِنَّكَ سَمِيعُ الدُّعَاءِ
duas.transliteration: Rabbi hab lī mi-l-ladunka dhuriyyatan ṭayyibah, innaka samīʿ-ud-duʿā’.
duas.translation: Ae mere Rabb, tu apne khazano se mujhe paak aulad ata farma. Beshaq, tu dua qubool karne wala hai. (3:38)

duas.title: Naye paida hone wale bacche ke walid ko mubarakbad dena
duas.arabic: بَارَكَ اللهُ لَكَ فِيْهِ وَجَعَلَهُ بَرًّا تَقِيًّا
duas.transliteration: Bārak-Allāhu laka fīhī wa jaʿalahū barran taqiyyā.
duas.translation: Allah is bacche ko tere liye barkat wala banaye aur isse neik aur parhezgar banaye.
duas.hadith: Anas (radiy Allāhū ʿanhu) ke mutabiq, Nabi ﷺ ne ye dua farmayi jab ek baccha paida hua. (Musnad al-Bazzār 7310)

duas.title: Bacchon ke liye hifazat ki dua
duas.arabic: أُعِيْذُكُمَا (أُعِيْذُكَ) بِكَلِمَاتِ اللّٰهِ التَّامَّةِ ، مِنْ كُلِّ شَيْطَانٍ وَّهَامَّةٍ ، وَمِنْ كُلِّ عَيْنٍ لَّامَّةٍ
duas.transliteration: Uʿīdhukumā (Uʿīdhuka) bi-kalimāti-llāhi-t-tāmmah, min kulli shayṭāniw-wa hāmmah, wa min kulli ʿaynil-lāmmah.
duas.translation: Main tum dono ko Allah ke kaamil kalimat mein panaah deta hoon, har Shayṭān, har nuqsan dene wali cheez aur har buri nazar se.
duas.hadith: Ibn ʿAbbās (radiy Allāhū ʿanhumā) ne riwayat kiya ke Nabi ﷺ apne nawase Hasan aur Husain (radiy Allāhū ʿanhumā) ke liye yeh dua farmate, aur kehte, 'Tumhare dada Ibrahim (ʿalayhis-salām) ne Ismail aur Ishaq ke liye yeh dua farmayi thi.' (Bukhārī 3371)

duas.title: Mushkil waqt mein maut ki tammana se bachne ki dua
duas.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ أَحْيِنِيْ مَا كَانَتِ الْحَيَاةُ خَيْرًا لِّيْ ، وَتَوَفَّنِيْ إِذَا كَانَتِ الْوَفَاةُ خَيْرًا لِّيْ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma aḥyinī mā kānati-l-ḥayātu khayral-lī, wa tawaffanī idhā kānati-l-wafātu khayral-lī.
duas.translation: Ae Allah, mujhe zinda rakh jab tak zindagi mere liye behtar hai, aur mujhe maut de jab maut mere liye behtar ho.
duas.hadith: Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya: 'Tumme se koi mushkilat ki wajah se maut ki tammana na kare. Balki woh yeh dua padhe [upar wali dua].' (Bukhārī 5671, Muslim 2680)

duas.title: Marne wale ko Shahadah par utharne ki talqeen
duas.arabic: لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا اللّٰهُ
duas.transliteration: Lā ilāha illa-llāh.
duas.translation: Allah ke siwa koi maabood nahi.
duas.hadith: Abū Saʿīd al-Khuḍrī (raḍiy Allāhu ‘anhu) ne riwayat kiya ke Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya: 'Tum apne marne wale ko [upar wali dua] par utharne ki talqeen karo.' (Muslim 916) Muʿādh b. Jabal (raḍiy Allāhu ‘anhu) ne riwayat kiya ke Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya: 'Jo shakhs ka aakhri kalam yeh ho [upar wali dua], woh jannat mein dakhil hoga.' (Abū Dāwūd 3116)

duas.title: Maut ke qareeb aane par #1
duas.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِيْ ، وارْحَمْنِيْ ، وَأَلْحِقْنِيْ بِالرَّفِيْقِ الأَعْلَى
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma-ghfir lī, wa-rḥamnī, wa alhiqnī bi-r-rafīqi-l-aʿlā.
duas.translation: Ae Allah, mujhe maaf farma, mujh par reham farma, aur mujhe buland rutbe wale rafeeq se mila de.
duas.hadith: ʿĀisha (raḍiy Allāhu ‘anhā) ne farmaya: 'Maine Nabi ﷺ ko yeh dua padte hue suna jab woh mere kandhe par tik kar lete hue the.' (Bukhārī 4440)

duas.title: Maut ke qareeb aane par #2
duas.arabic: لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا اللّٰهُ وَاللّٰهُ أَكْبَرُ ، لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا اللّٰهُ وَحْدَهُ ، لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا اللّٰهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيْكَ لَهُ ، لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا اللّٰهُ لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا اللّٰهُ وَلَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللّٰهِ
duas.transliteration: Lā ilāha illallāh, wa Allāhu akbar, lā ilāha illa-llāh, waḥdah, lā ilāha illallāh, waḥdahū lā sharīka lahū, lā ilāha illallāh, lahu-l-mulku wa lahu-l-ḥamdu, lā ilāha illallāh, wa lā ḥawla wa lā quwwata illā billāh.
duas.translation: Allah ke siwa koi maabood nahi, Allah sabse bada hai. Allah ke siwa koi maabood nahi, woh akela hai, uska koi shareek nahi. Allah ke siwa koi maabood nahi, usi ke liye tamaam kudrat aur tamaam shukr hai. Allah ke siwa koi maabood nahi, koi qudrat aur taqat nahi magar Allah ke zariye.
duas.hadith: Al-Agarr Abī Muslim (raḥimahullāh) ne riwayat kiya ke Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya: 'Jo shakhs yeh dua padhta hai jab woh bimar ho ya maut ke qareeb ho, agar uska aakhri kalam yeh ho, to aag usko kha nahi sakti.' (Tirmidhī 3430)

duas.title: Maut ke baad #1
duas.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لَهُ ، وَارْفَعْ دَرَجَتَهُ فِي الْمَهْدِيِّينَ ، وَاخْلُفْهُ فِي عَقِبِهِ فِي الْغَابِرِيْنَ ، وَاغْفِرْ لَنَا وَلَهُ يَا رَبَّ الْعَالَمِينَ ، وَافْسَحْ لَهُ فِي قَبْرِهِ ، وَنَوِّرْ لَهُ فِيهِ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma-ghfir lah, wa-rfaʿ darajatahū fi-l-mahdiyyīn, wa-khlufhu fi ʿaqibihi fi-l-ghābirīn, wa-ghfir lanā wa lahū yā Rabba-l-ʿālamīn, wa-fsaḥ lahū fi qabrih, wa nawwir lahū fīh.
duas.translation: Ae Allah, uski maghfirat farma, uska darja hidayat yafatagon mein buland kar, aur jo uske baad hain unka khayal rakh. Ae Rabbe Aalam, humari aur uski maghfirat farma, uske qabr ko wasay kar aur usme roshni farma.
duas.hadith: Umm Salamah (raḍiy Allāhu ʿanhā) ne farmaya ke Nabi ﷺ ne yeh dua farmayi jab Abū Salamah wafat pa gaye. (Muslim 920)

duas.title: Maut ke baad #2
duas.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِيْ وَلَهُ وَأَعْقِبْنِي مِنْهُ عُقْبَي حَسَنَةً
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma-ghfir lī wa lahu wa aʿaqibnī minhu ʿuqbā ḥasantan.
duas.translation: Ae Allah, meri aur uski maghfirat farma aur uske baad mujhe behtareen badla ata farma.
duas.hadith: Umm Salamah (raḍiy Allāhu ‘anhā) ne farmaya ke jab Abū Salamah wafat hue, to Nabi ﷺ ne yeh dua farmayi. (Muslim 919)

duas.title: Maut ke baad #3
duas.arabic: إِنَّا لِلّٰهِ وَإِنَّا إلَيْهِ رَاجِعُوْنَ ، اَللّٰهُمَّ أْجُرْنِْي فِيْ مُصِيْبَتِيْ ، وَأَخْلِفْ لِيْ خَيْرًا مِنْهَا
duas.transliteration: Innā lillāhi wa innā ilayhi rājiʿūn, Allāhumma-‘jurnī fī muṣībatī, wa akhlif lī khayram-minhā.
duas.translation: Hum Allah ke hain aur humein usi ki taraf laut kar jaana hai. Ae Allah, mujhe meri museebat mein ajar ata farma aur uske badle mujhe behtar cheez ata farma.
duas.hadith: Umm Salamah (raḍiy Allāhu ʿanhā) ne farmaya ke jab Abū Salamah wafat hue, to maine yeh dua ki, aur Allah ne mujhe uska badla diya ke Nabi ﷺ se meri shadi hui. (Muslim 918)

duas.title: Qabaristaan ki dua
duas.arabic: اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكُمْ أَهْلَ الدِّيَارِ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ والْمُسْلِمِيْنَ ، وَإِنَّا إِنْ شَاءَ اللّٰهُ بِكُمْ لَاحِقُوْنَ ، نَسْأَلُ اللّٰهَ لَنَا وَلَكُمُ الْعَافِيَةَ
duas.transliteration: As-salāmu ʿalaykum ahla-d-diyāri minal-mu’minīna wal-muslimīn, wa innā in shā’a-llahu bikum lāḥiqūn, nas’alullāha lanā wa-lakumu-l-ʿāfiyah.
duas.translation: Tum par salamti ho, ae iman aur islam wale gharwalo. Hum bhi inshaAllah tumhare paas aane wale hain. Hum Allah se apni aur tumhari afiyat ki dua karte hain.
duas.hadith: Buraydah (raḍiy Allāhu ʿanhu) ne riwayat kiya ke Nabi ﷺ yeh dua qabaristaan mein padte the. (Ibn Mājah 1547)

duas.title: Qabr mein mayyat ko daakhil karte waqt
duas.arabic: بِسْمِ اللّٰهِ وَعَلَى سُنَّةِ رَسُوْلِ اللّٰهِ
duas.transliteration: Bismillāhi wa ʿalā sunnati rasūli-llah.
duas.translation: Allah ke naam ke saath aur Allah ke Rasool ki sunnat ke mutabiq.
duas.hadith: Ibn ʿUmar (radiy Allāhū ‘anhumā) ne riwayat kiya ke jab Nabi ﷺ mayyat ko qabr mein daakhil karte to yeh dua farmate. (Abū Dāwūd 3213)

duas.title: Mushkil waqt mein sabr aur ajar ki dua
duas.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ أَجِرْنِيْ فِيْ مُصِيْبَتِيْ وَأَخْلِفْ لِيْ خَيْرًا مِنْهَا
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma ajirnī fī muṣībatī wa akhlif lī khayran minhā.
duas.translation: Ae Allah, mujhe meri museebat mein ajar ata farma aur uske badle mujhe behtar ata farma.
duas.hadith: Umm Salamah (raḍiy Allāhu ʿanhā) ne farmaya ke jab Abū Salamah wafat hue, to maine yeh dua ki, aur Allah ne mujhe uska badla diya ke Nabi ﷺ se meri shadi hui. (Muslim 918)

duas.title: Mayyat ke liye duaa #1 (Janazah ki namaz mein)
duas.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ اغْفِـرْ لَهُ ، وَارْحَمْـهُ ، وَعَافِهِ ، وَاعْفُ عَنْـهُ ، وَأَكْـرِمْ نُزُلَـهُ ، وَوَسِّـعْ مُدْخَـلَهُ ، وَاغْسِلْـهُ بِالْمَـاءِ وَالثَّلْجِ وَالْبَرَدِ ، وَنَقِّـهِ مِنَ الْخَطَـايَا كَمَا نَـقَّيْتَ الـثَّوْبَ الأَبْيَـضَ مِنَ الدَّنَـسِ ، وَأَبْـدِلْهُ دَارًا خَـيْرًا مِّنْ دَارِهِ ، وَأَهْلًا خَـيْرًا مِّنْ أَهْلِـهِ ، وَزَوْجًا خَـيْرًا مِّنْ زَوْجِهِ ، وَأَدْخِـلْهُ الْجَـنَّةَ ، وَأَعِـذْهُ مِنْ عَذَابِ الْقَـبْرِ وَعَذَابِ النَّـارِ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma-ghfir lah, wa-rḥamh, waʿāfih, waʿfu ʿanh, wa akrim nuzulahu, wa wassʿi mudkhalah, wa-ghsilhu bi-l-māi’ wa-th-thalji wa-l-barad, wa naqqihī mina-l-khaṭāyā kamā naqqayta-th-thawba-l-abyaḍa mina-d-danas, wa abdilhu dāran khayra-m-min dārih, wa ahlan khayra-m-min ahlih, wa zawjan khayra-m-min zawjih, wa adkhilhu-l-jannah, wa-aʿidh-hu min ʿadhābi-l-qabri wa ʿadhābi-n-nār.
duas.translation: Ae Allah, uski maghfirat farma, us par reham kar, usko afiyat de aur usko maaf farma. Uske liye izzat bhara maqam tay kar, aur uske qabar mein wasat farma. Usko paani, barf aur ola se dhoke saaf kar, aur usko gunaahon se saaf kar jese safed kapde ko mail se saaf kiya jata hai. Uske ghar ko behtareen ghar se badal de, uske ghar walon ko behtareen logon se badal de, aur uske jode ko behtareen jode se badal de. Usko jannat mein daakhil kar, aur usko qabar aur dozakh ke azaab se mehfooz rakh.
duas.hadith: ʿAwf b. Mālik (raḍiy Allāhu ʿanhu) ne riwayat kiya ke Nabi ﷺ ne janazah ki namaz mein yeh dua ki, aur main chahta tha ke kaash yeh dua meri liye hoti. (Muslim 963)

duas.title: Mayyat ke liye duaa #2 (Janazah ki namaz mein)
duas.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِحَيِّنَا وَمَيِّتِنَا ، وَشَاهِدِنَا وَغَائِبِنَا ، وَصَغِيْرِنَا وَكَبِيْرِنَا ، وَذَكَرِنَا وَأُنْثَانَا ، اَللّٰهُمَّ مَنْ أَحْيَيْتَهُ مِنَّا فَأَحْيِهِ عَلَى الْإِسْلَامِ ، وَمَنْ تَوَفَّيْتَهُ مِنَّا فَتَوَفَّهُ عَلَى الْإِيْمَانِ ، اَللّٰهُمَّ لَا تَحْرِمْنَا أَجْرَهُ ، وَلَا تُضِلَّنَا بَعْدَهُ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma-ghfir li-ḥayyinā wa mayyitinā, wa shāhidinā wa ghā-ibinā, wa ṣaghīrinā wa kabīrinā, wa dhakarinā wa unthānā, Allāhumma man aḥyaytahū minnā fa-ahyihī ʿala-l-Islām, wa man tawaffaytahū minnā fa-tawaffahū ʿala-l-īmān, Allāhumma lā taḥrimnā ajrah, wa lā tuḍillanā baʿdah.
duas.translation: Ae Allah, humare jo zinda hain aur jo wafat pa chuke hain, humare jo mojood hain aur jo ghaib hain, humare jo chote hain aur jo bade hain, aur humare jo mard hain aur jo auratein hain, sab ki maghfirat farma. Ae Allah, jo tu zinda rakhe, usko islam par zinda rakh aur jo tu uthale, usko imaan par uthale. Ae Allah, humein is mayyat ke ajr se mehroom na farma aur uske baad humein gumrah na hone de.
duas.hadith: Abū Hurayrah (raḍiy Allāhu ʿanhu) ne riwayat kiya ke Nabi ﷺ ne yeh dua janazah ki namaz mein ki. (Composite: Abū Dāwūd 3201, Tirmidhī 1024 )

duas.title: Mayyat ke liye duaa #3 (Janazah ki namaz mein)
duas.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ إِنَّ فُلَانَ بْنَ فُلَانٍ فِي ذِمَّتِكَ وَحَبْلِ جِوَارِكَ ، فَقِهِ مِنْ فِتْنَةِ الْقَبْرِ وَعَذَابِ النَّارِ ، وَأَنْتَ أَهْلُ الْوَفَاءِ وَالْحَقِّ ، فَاغْفِرْ لَهُ وَارْحَمْهُ ، إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الْغَفُوْرُ الرَّحِيْمُ‏
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma inna fulāna-bna fulānin fi ẓimmatika wa ḥabli jiwārika, faqihi min fitnati-l-qabri wa ʿadhābi-n-nār, wa Anta Ahlu-l-Wafā’i wa-l-Ḥaqq, fa-ghfir lahu wa-rḥamhu, innaka Anta-l-Gafūru-r-Raḥim.
duas.translation: Ae Allah, yeh shakhs teri hifazat aur amanat mein hai. Isko qabar ke fitne aur dozakh ke azaab se mehfooz rakh. Tu wafadari aur sachai ka malik hai. Iski maghfirat farma aur ispar reham kar. Beshak tu bakshne wala aur raheem hai.
duas.hadith: Wāthilah b.al-Asqaʿ (raḍiy Allāhu ‘anhu) ne riwayat kiya ke Nabi ﷺ ne yeh dua janazah ki namaz mein ki. (Ibn Mājah 1499)

duas.title: Mayyat ke liye duaa #4 (Janazah ki namaz mein)
duas.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ أنْتَ رَبُّهَا ، وَأَنْتَ خَلَقْتَهَا ، وَأَنْتَ هَدَيْتَهَا لِلْإِسْلَامِ ، وَأَنْتَ قَبَضْتَ رُوْحَهَا ، وَأَنْتَ أعْلَمُ بِسِرِّهَا وَعَلَانِيَتِهَا ، جِئْنَا شُفَعَاءَ ، فَاغْفِرْ لَهُ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma Anta Rabbuha, wa Anta khlaqtahā, wa Anta hadaytaha li-l-Islām, wa Anta qabaḍta rūḥahā, wa Anta Aʿlamu bi-sirrihā wa ʿalāniyatihā, ji’nā shufaʿā; fa-ghfir lahu.
duas.translation: Ae Allah, Tu iska Rab hai aur Tu ne isko paida kiya. Tu ne isko Islam par chalne ki hidayat di. Tu ne iski rooh qabz ki aur Tu iske raaz aur zaahir ko khoob jaanta hai. Hum iske liye shifa'at karne aaye hain, to iski maghfirat farma.
duas.hadith: Abū Hurayrah (raḍiy Allāhu ‘anhu) se riwayat hai ke Nabi ﷺ janazah ki namaz mein yeh dua karte. (Abū Dāwūd 3200)

duas.title: Mayyat ke liye duaa #5 (Janazah ki namaz mein)
duas.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ عَبْدُكَ وَابْنُ أَمَتِكَ احْتَاجَ إِلَى رَحْمَتِكَ ، وَأَنْتَ غَنِيٌّ عَنْ عَذَابِهِ ، إِنْ كَانَ مُحْسِنًا فَزِدْ فِيْ حَسَنَاتِهِ ، وَإِنْ كَانَ مُسِيْئًا فَتَجَاوَزْ عَنْهُ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma ʿabduka wa-bnu amatika ihtāja ilā raḥmatik, wa Anta Ghaniyyun ʿan ʿadhābih, in kāna muḥsinan fa-zid fī ḥasanātih, wa in kāna musī’an fa-tajāwaz ʿanhu.
duas.translation: Ae Allah, yeh tera banda aur teri laundi ka beta teri reham ka mohtaaj hai aur Tu uske azaab se be-niyaaz hai. Agar yeh nek tha to iske nekiyon mein izafa farma aur agar isne gunah kiye to inhe maaf farma.
duas.hadith: Yazīd b. Abdullāh b. Rukānah b. al-Muṭṭalib (raḍiy Allāhu ‘anhu) ne riwayat kiya ke Nabi ﷺ janazah ki namaz mein yeh dua farmate. (Hākim 1328, Ṭabarāni in Muʿjam al-Kabīr 647)

duas.title: Barish hone par
duas.arabic: (اَللّٰهُمَّ) صَيِّبًا نَّافِعًا
duas.transliteration: (Allāhumma) ṣayyiban nāfiʿā.
duas.translation: (Ae Allah) is barish ko nafa dene wali barish bana de.
duas.hadith: ʿĀ’ishah (raḍiy Allāhu ʿanhā) riwayat karti hain: “Jab kabhi Nabi ﷺ barish dekhtay, to yeh dua parhtay.” (Bukhārī 1032)

duas.title: Barish ke baad
duas.arabic: مُطِرْنَا بِفَضْلِ اللهِ وَرَحْمَتِهِ
duas.transliteration: Muṭirnā bi-faḍli-llāhi wa raḥmatih.
duas.translation: Humein Allah ke fazl aur rahmat se barish naseeb hui.
duas.hadith: Zayd b. Khālid al-Juhanī (raḍiy Allāhu ʿanhu) riwayat kartay hain ke Nabi ﷺ ne Fajr namaz parhayi ek raat ke baad jis mein barish hui thi. Namaz ke baad unho ne kaha, “Tumhare Rab ne farmaya hai, ‘Is subah mere kuch banday momin ban gaye aur kuch kafir ban gaye.’” (Bukhārī 846, Muslim 71)

duas.title: Barish talab karte waqt #1
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اسْقِنَا غَيْثًا مُغِيْثًا مَرِيْئًا ، مَرِيْعًا نَافِعًا ، غَيْرَ ضَارٍّ ، عَاجِلًا غَيْرَ آجِلٍ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma-sqinā ghaythan mughīthan, marīʿan nāfiʿan, ghayra dharrin, ʿajilan ghayra ājil.
duas.translation: Ae Allah, humein barish ata farma jo rahat dene wali, sehatmand, nafa dene wali ho, zarar na dene wali ho, aur jaldi aane wali ho.
duas.hadith: Jābir b. ʿAbdullāh (raḍiy Allāhu ‘anhu) riwayat kartay hain: “Kuch auratein Nabi ﷺ ke paas roti hui aayi kyunki barish nahi ho rahi thi, aur unho ne yeh dua ki, phir aasman barish se bhar gaya.” (Abū Dāwūd 1169)

duas.title: Barish talab karte waqt #2
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اسْقِ عِبَادَكَ وَبَهَائِمَكَ ، وَانْشُرْ رَحْمَتَكَ ، وَأَحْيِ بَلَدَكَ الْمَيِّتَ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma-sqi ʿibādaka wa bahā’imaka wa-nshur raḥmataka wa aḥyi baladaka-l-mayyit.
duas.translation: Ae Allah, apne bandon aur janwaron ko pani de, apni rahmat barpa farma aur apni murda zameen ko zinda kar.
duas.hadith: Jābir b. ʿAbdullāh (raḍiy Allāhu ‘anhu) ne yeh dua kari aur phir aasman barish se bhar gaya.” (Abū Dāwūd 1176)

duas.title: Barish talab karte waqt #3
duas.arabic: ‏الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِيْنَ ، الرَّحْمَنِ الرَّحِيْمِ ، مَلِكِ يَوْمِ الدِّيْنِ ، لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ يَفْعَلُ مَا يُرِيْدُ ، اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ اللَّهُ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ الْغَنِيُّ وَنَحْنُ الْفُقَرَاءُ ، أَنْزِلْ عَلَيْنَا الْغَيْثَ وَاجْعَلْ مَا أَنْزَلْتَ لَنَا قُوَّةً وَبَلاَغًا إِلَى حِيْنٍ ، أَشْهَدُ أَنَّ اللَّهَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيْرٌ ، وَأَنِّي عَبْدُ اللَّهِ وَرَسُوْلُهُ
duas.transliteration: Alḥamdu-lillāhi Rabbi-l-ʿālamīn, ar-Raḥmāni-r-Raḥīm, Māliki yawmi-d-dīn, lā ilāha illa-llāhu yafʿalu mā yurīdu, Allāhumma Anta-llāhu lā ilāha illa Anta-l-Ganiyyu wa naḥnu-l-fuqarā, anzil ʿalayna-l-ghaytha wa-jʿal ma anzalta lanā quwwatan wa balāgan ilā ḥīnin, ash-hadu anna-llāha ʿalā kulli shay’in Qadīr, wa annī ʿabdu-llāhi wa rasūluh.
duas.translation: Har tareef Allah ke liye hai, jo saare jahanon ka paalnay wala hai, nihayat mehrban aur raheem hai, roz-e-qayamat ka malik hai. Allah ke siwa koi maabood nahi, jo kuch wo chahta hai, wahi karta hai. Ae Allah, tuhi Allah hai, tere siwa koi maabood nahi, tu nihayat be-niyaz hai aur hum nihayat gareeb hain. Hum par barish nazil farma aur jo kuch tu ne hum par nazil farmaya hai, usay humein quwwat aur zamanay tak zariya banade. Main gawahi deta hoon ke Allah har cheez par qadir hai, aur main Allah ka banda aur uska rasool hoon.
duas.hadith: ʿĀishah (raḍiy Allāhu ‘anhā) ke log Nabi ﷺ ke paas aaye aur barish na hone ki shikayat ki. Nabi ﷺ ne minbar par bethkar yeh dua ki aur phir barish hui. (Abū Dāwūd 1173)

duas.title: Barish talab karte waqt #4
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَغِثْنَا، اللَّهُمَّ أَغِثْنَا، اللَّهُمَّ أَغِثْنَا
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma agithnā, Allāhumma agithnā, Allāhumma agithnā.
duas.translation: Ae Allah, humein barish ata farma. Ae Allah, humein barish ata farma. Ae Allah, humein barish ata farma.
duas.hadith: Anas b. Malik (raḍiy Allāhu ‘anhu) riwayat kartay hain ke ek shakhs Nabi ﷺ ke paas aaya aur kaha ke maweshi mar rahe hain aur raste band ho gaye hain, barish ke liye dua karein. Nabi ﷺ ne yeh dua ki aur phir barish hui. (Bukhārī 1014)

duas.title: Zor ki barish hone par
duas.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ حَوَالَيْنَا وَلَا عَلَيْنَا ، اَللّٰهُمَّ عَلَى الآكَامِ وَالظِّرَابِ ، وَبُطُوْنِ الْأَوْدِيَةِ ، وَمَنَابِتِ الشَّجَرِ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma ḥawālaynā wa lā ʿalaynā, Allāhumma ʿala-l-ākāmi wa-ẓ-ẓirāb, wa buṭūni-l-awdiyah, wa manābiti-sh-shajar.
duas.translation: Ae Allah, barish ko hamare ird gird kar de aur hum par na barsa. Ae Allah, pahadiyon par, sadon par, waadiyon ke ander aur jahan jahan darakht ugte hain, wahan barish barsa.
duas.hadith: Anas b. Mālik (raḍiy Allāhu ʿanhu) riwayat kartay hain ke ek shakhs ne Nabi ﷺ se barish rokne ki dua karne ki darkhwast ki, to Nabi ﷺ ne yeh dua ki. (Bukhārī 1014)

duas.title: Bijli chamakti waqt
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِيْ يُسَبِّحُ الرَّعْدُ بِحَمْدِهِ ، وَالْمَلَائِكَةُ مِنْ خِيْفَتِهِ
duas.transliteration: Subḥāna-lladhī yusabbiḥur-raʿdu bi-ḥamdih, wa-l-malā’ikatu min khīfatih.
duas.translation: Paak hai wo Zaat jise bijli apni tareef ke saath tasbeeh karti hai, aur farishte uski khauf se.
duas.hadith: Jab ʿAbdullah b. al-Zubayr (raḍiy Allāhu ʿanhu) bijli chamakti sunte, to wo yeh dua parhtay. (al-Adab al-Mufrad 723, Muwaṭṭa’ 3641)

duas.title: Hawa chalne par #1
duas.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ إِنِّيْ أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَهَا وَخَيْرَ مَا فِيْهَا وَخَيْرَ مَا أُرْسِلَتْ بِهِ ، وَأَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّهَا وَشَرِّ مَا فِيْهَا وَشَرِّ مَا أُرْسِلَتْ بِهِ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma innī as’aluka khayrahā wa khayra mā fīhā wa khayra mā ursilat bih, wa aʿūdhu bika min sharrihā wa sharri mā fīhā wa sharri mā ursilat bih.
duas.translation: Ae Allah, mein tujhse iski khair, jo ismein hai aur jo iske saath aayi hai, uski khair mangta hoon. Aur mein tujhse iski sharr, jo ismein hai aur jo iske saath aayi hai, uski sharr se panah mangta hoon.
duas.hadith: ʿĀʿishāh (raḍiy Allāhu ʿanhā) kehti hain ke jab hawa tez chalti, to Nabi ﷺ yeh dua karte. (Muslim 899)

duas.title: Hawa chalne par #2
duas.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ لَقَحًا لَا عَقِيْمًا
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma laqaḥan lā aqīmā.
duas.translation: Ae Allah, isse asar dene wali hawa bana aur isse banjar na bana.
duas.hadith: Salamah b. al-Akwaʿ (raḍiy Allāhu ʿanhu) riwayat kartay hain ke jab hawa bohot tez chalti, to Nabi ﷺ yeh dua karte. (Ibn Ḥibbān 1008)

duas.title: Chand nazar aane par
duas.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ أَهِلَّهُ عَلَيْنَا بِالْيُمْنِ وَالْإِيْمَانِ ، وَالسَّلَامَةِ وَالْإِسْلَامِ ، رَبِّيْ وَرَبُّكَ اللّٰهُ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma ahillahū ʿalaynā bi-l-yumni wa-l-īmān, wa-s-salāmati wa-l-islām, Rabbī wa Rabbuka-llāh.
duas.translation: Ae Allah, is chand ko hum par barkat, imaan, salamati aur islam ke saath ugalne de. Mera Rab aur tera Rab Allah hai.
duas.hadith: Ṭalḥah b. ʿUbaydillāh (raḍiy Allāhu ʿanhu) ne riwayat kiya ke jab Nabi ﷺ chand dekhte, to yeh dua karte. (Tirmidhī 3451)

duas.title: Naye phal nazar aane par
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَـنَا فِي ثَمَرِنَا ، وبَارِكْ لَـنَا فِي مَدِيْنَتِنَا ، وبَارِكْ لَـنَا فِي صَاعِنَا ، وبَارِكْ لَنـَا فِي مُدِّنَا
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma bārik lanā fī thamarinā, wa bārik lanā fī madīnatinā, wa bārik lanā fī sāʿinā, wa bārik lanā fī muddinā.
duas.translation: Ae Allah, hamare phalon mein barkat ata farma, hamare sheher mein barkat ata farma, hamare saʿ (measurement) mein barkat ata farma, aur hamare mudd (measurement) mein barkat ata farma.
duas.hadith: Abū Hurayrah (raḍiy Allāhu ‘anhu) ne riwayat kiya ke log jab naye phal dekhte to wo Nabi ﷺ ke paas laya karte aur Nabi ﷺ yeh dua karte. (Muslim 1373)

duas.title: Kutton ke bhonknay par
duas.arabic: أَعُوْذُ بِاللهِ مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ الرَّجِيْمِ
duas.transliteration: Aʿūdhu bi-llāhi mina-sh-Shayṭāni-r-rajīm.
duas.translation: Mein Allah ki panah mangta hoon shayṭān e rajeem se.
duas.hadith: Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya: “Jab tum raat mein kutton ke bhonkne aur gadhe ki aawaz suno, to Allah ki panah maango, kyunki wo us cheez ko dekhte hain jo tum nahi dekhte.” (Abū Dāwūd 5103)

duas.title: Gadhe ke ragne par
duas.arabic: أَعُوْذُ بِاللهِ مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ الرَّجِيْمِ
duas.transliteration: Aʿūdhu bi-llāhi mina-sh-Shayṭāni-r-rajīm.
duas.translation: Mein Allah ki panah mangta hoon shayṭān e rajeem se.
duas.hadith: Nabi ﷺ ne farmaya: “Jab tum raat mein kutton ke bhonkne aur gadhe ki aawaz suno, to Allah ki panah maango, kyunki wo us cheez ko dekhte hain jo tum nahi dekhte.” (Abū Dāwūd 5103)
